EmailTemplate.description: Direct customer to portal for large quote request
EmailTemplate.name: Large Quote Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Large Quote Request Notice {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Due to the number of line items you have requested, we need you to use www.MyAerospace.com portal to send us your request for quotation.
Please note that we closed your case number associated with this request.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
